name: Akkad
declaringWar: You hinder the interests of the Ruler of Totality, and thus, you shall be vanquished.
attacked: You will see a unprecendented conquest by me, little man. Our troops are never busy in peace.
defeated: Say all you want about my land, you can smash my epics about me, but I am engraved to the memory of the gods.
introduction: I am Sargon of Akkad, the King of Akkad herself, King of Sumer, and King of the Universe. What would you like to discuss to I?
tradeRequest: Our heartland may be far away from yours, but we offer you this agreement.
uniques: [+2 Happiness, +3 Culture] [in annexed cities]
[+15]% Strength <vs cities>

name: Elam
declaringWar: A barbarian you are, your plains will be piled up by the bodies of your soldiers
attacked: Such foolish decision. I have destroyed dynasties, and you shall be one of them.
introduction: Welcome, foreigner. I am Kindattu of Elam.
tradeRequest: Foreigner, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [+3 Culture, +1 Production] from each Trade Route
Gain [10]-[20] [Faith] <upon declaring friendship>
Allied City-States provide [Science] equal to [5]% of what they produce for themselves

name: Mitanni
declaringWar: We may be different from the rest of our neighbours, but we can still destroy you.
attacked: Do you dare to challenge me?
introduction: Welcome, stranger. I am Parshatatar, king of the Hurrians.
tradeRequest: Stranger, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [3] free [Chariot Archer] units appear <upon discovering [Horseback Riding]>

name: Arzawa
declaringWar: You are a danger to us.
defeated: Sooner your cities and farms will be destroyed by the wrath of the gods.
introduction: Welcome to Luwia, I am the king Tarhuntaradu.
tradeRequest: Dearest king, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +2 Culture] from [Gold Ore] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Gold, +3 Culture] from [Copper] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Faith] from all [Shrine] buildings

name: Minoa
attacked: A lion is more civilized than what you are, do you want to go to Daedalus?
defeated: I wish you fortune for the ages to come.
introduction: I am Minos of Crete, bow down for you are mortals.
tradeRequest: Greetings mortal, we can have goods to exchange.
uniques: [+1 Faith] from [Cattle] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] from all [Culture] buildings
[+1 Culture] from all [Happiness] buildings <during a Golden Age>
[+15]% [Gold] [in all coastal cities] <when not at war>
[+10]% [Science] [in all coastal cities] <when not at war>
[+15]% [Culture] [in all coastal cities] <when not at war
[+1 Culture, +1 Science] from each Trade Route

name: Zhou
attacked: Honesty is the best policy, and you have honestly displayed your thoughts.
defeated: The general of a large army may be defeated, but you cannot defeat the determined minds of the people.
introduction: Greetings, I am Confucius, the great teacher of all.
hateHello: We are open to your words.
tradeRequest: Dear friend, it is up to your will to accept this request.
uniques: [+15]% Strength <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>
[+20]% [Culture] [in all cities]

name: Magadha
declaringWar: Even if almost every citizen of ours is dead your defeat will be glorious.
attacked: Just like Arjuna your generals shall perish.
defeated: Take care of our lands, our animals, and whatever we have for you.
introduction: I am Bimbisara of the land of the Indians, and a companion of the Buddha.
hateHello: We are open to your words.
tradeRequest: Shall you accept this request by me?
uniques: [+1 Faith] from [Forest] tiles [in all cities] <after discovering [Writing]>

name: Nubia
declaringWar: Arrows will be fired to your soldier's throats, for you are more aggressive than a lion.
attacked: Nice for us that you want defeat.
defeated: Our monuments will last for eternity, for you shall certainly fall.
introduction: I am Amanitore, the Queen of Nubia. Speak more about your people, we can share information about each other.
tradeRequest: Let us exchange goods for our betterment.
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Ranged] units [in all cities with a garrison]
Empire enters a [5] Golden Age <upon conquering a city> <with [50]% chance>
[+15]% Strength <for [Archery] units> <when attacking> <vs cities>

name: Urartu
declaringWar: The mountains of Urartu will collapse to your filthy plains.
defeated: The mountains are our monuments, indestructible forever.
introduction: I am Argishti, king of Urartu, I welcome you to our numerous mountains.
tradeRequest: Would you be kind to accept this agreement of ours?
uniques: [+2 Gold, +1 Food] from [Mountain] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Production] from [Wheat] tiles [in all cities]
[20]% Gold <in cities with a [Castle]>

name: Medes
declaringWar: Such a fool you are, you shall be vanquished.
defeated: This may be your first conquest, but our legacy is engrained today.
introduction: I am Cyaxares, king of the Medians.
hateHello: Fuck you all my homies hate you.
tradeRequest: Friend, would you accept this agreement?
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Camp] tiles [in all cities]
[-25]% maintenance costs <for [Mounted] units>
[+2 Science, +1 Production] from each Trade Route

name: Etruscans
declaringWar: The gods have chosen me for this endeavour.
attacked: We will make such inflicting blows to your morale and sanity.
defeated: You may destroy our monuments, erase our language from the world, but the gods have favor in us.
introduction:
Hello?

Listen!

Listen to the stars!

It's right in front of me!

I am Tarchon, king of the Etruscans. To you we may be aliens, but do not worry, we are a friendly people.
neutralHello:
When I'm out there all alone

And feeling far from home

I'm fading into blue

And there's nothing I can do Then out on the sky like a flash

Sending me high, high, high

You rescue me

You saved me from a certain tragedy

I get messages from the stars

When you're making love to me

I get messages from the stars

You must be from another galaxy
hateHello:
When I'm far out in the night 
And searching for a light 
There's darkness all around 
And you're nowhere to be found

Then out on the sky like a flash

Sending me high, high, high

You rescue me

You saved me from a certain tragedy

I get messages from the stars

When you're making love to me

I get messages from the stars

You must be from another galaxy
tradeRequest: Let us exchange resources for the betterment of our nations.
uniques: [-40]% [Gold] [in all cities]
[+40]% [Gold] [in capital]
[+1 Gold, +1 Culture, +1 Production, +1 Science] [in all cities]
[-60]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all non-occupied cities]
[-1 Gold, -1 Culture, -1 Production, -1 Science] [in capital]
[+40]% [Gold] from City-States
[-20]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities connected to capital] <when not at war>
[+1 Gold, +1 Culture] from each Trade Route <when not at war>
[+1 Gold, +1 Culture] from [Marble] tiles [in all cities]

name: Lacedaemon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Sparta is willing to serve you!

name: Palembang
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Now, witness the power of the Indonesians!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?
